üìú Manifesto

I believe that technology can be a powerful tool for creating positive change in the world. As a full-stack web developer and data analyst, I strive to use my skills and expertise to build high-quality, user-friendly websites and applications that help businesses and organizations achieve their goals.
With a background in business administration and 3+ years of experience in web development, I understand the importance of delivering projects on time and within budget. I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest web development technologies and trends, and to continuously improving my skills and knowledge.

As a DataCamp Certified Data Analyst, I have a strong foundation in data analysis and visualization, and I understand the power of data to inform decision-making and drive business growth. I am skilled in using a variety of data analysis tools and techniques, and I am committed to working with data in a responsible and ethical manner.
I am currently working remotely as a web developer for a USA-based digital marketing agency, JIB Stone, and as Chief of Technical Operations at a national award-winning healthcare startup, DhakaCast. In these roles, I have learned the importance of collaboration, communication, and leadership, and I am committed to fostering a culture of teamwork and excellence in all of my work.

My goal as a full-stack web developer and data analyst is to create high-quality, user-friendly websites and applications that help businesses and organizations achieve their goals and make a positive impact in the world. I believe that technology can be a force for good, and I am committed to using my skills and expertise to make a difference.
